modules.name: CSS-Base
modules.prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code (no HTML/JS/explanations). Code: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{background:#0a0a0a;overflow:hidden}canvas{position:fixed;top:0;left:0}

modules.name: CSS-Button
modules.prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code (no HTML/JS/explanations). Code: #startBtn{position:fixed;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:99;padding:20px 40px;font-size:18px;font-family:system-ui;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.1);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);border-radius:10px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer}#startBtn:hover{background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2)}
